storyInfo: After a collaborative mission with Babel, Savage returns to the mines of Rim Billiton, safeguarding the Originium operations, and waiting for some day when her own fate will change.

attributes.content: 2:03 P.M. \ Clear
Iron Carrot City Exterior Mining Site, Mineshaft #26
Tough shift, Johnny. Done down there?
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Worker

attributes.content: Phew.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: I'm buggered. Pull me up.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Er, I'm in all clean clothes...
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Worker

attributes.content: What's your problem, eh? You're going under next, aren'tcha?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: What did you need me for?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Security inspector's here. Come to ask the state of things down below.
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Worker

attributes.content: What state of things? When's any shift I've led all these years had a slip-up?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Send ol' Inspeccy to talk with the next shift leader.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: I'm having myself a nice bath. If the Security cohort want to wait for me, they can wait patient.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: ...Oh, there's a surprise.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: If it isn't our girl. Back from that long trip of yours?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Been an age, you boneheaded oldie.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: And what do you mean, long trip...? I'm doing proper work, you know.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Lighten up, now. I know, you're posted over at Babel, doing big things just all the livelong day.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Seen plenty of the world these two years, haven'tcha?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Nothing all that scary... tagging along around different places, that's all.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: And I mean, my work didn't even touch on any core details.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hmph. Get a load of you. Finally knowing to come back.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Don't know if it was something upstairs or at Babel, but they were getting along just fine, and then suddenly, there they are, over 'cause they say it's over.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Frankly, I haven't got the first clue either.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Forget it. Been back home yet?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Already told them I'm sound.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: When'd you get back?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Three days ago...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hmph. You know, all your pals in Sec from before got promoted, and here you are now dancing back under their fingers.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Why so eager for the job here? Everything with Babel all sorted, then?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: I'd guess the world's on your shoulders, looking like that.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Not here to play 20 Questions on ya, just say what I wanted and be done.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: But it's a hard thing to do, getting back home to see your old mates. Still not happy?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: I don't... know, myself.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Of course I missed you all, and I mean, I know my hometown mines like nothing else.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I just feel—things wrapped up too fast.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: (Whistle) Look at you. Who says you didn't land a good assignment?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Or was it some sweetheart you found that you just can't bear to leave?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Wh—What sweetheart—just a friend, okay!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Ugh... besides, I didn't do anything praiseworthy either.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: No, I heard you picked up a big job. Digging those 'goods' out one after another's cost two years of our time.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: All the workers reckon it has to be something happened outside.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Lots of engineering going on. But I'm only on the bog-standard stuff.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Cooperation this time was to make sure the 'goods' going from Rim Billiton to Babel had a safe journey and made it without hassle. They needed a security crew to see it through.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: And just like that, the hull and core our mining firm dug up gets sent straight to Babel.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I had some security work to do with them. That's it.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: So you're saying you really don't know a damn thing?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: (Bitter chuckle) John, you know me, don't you...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Old girl... *sigh* Still same as ever, then, making a complete mess of it when the moment comes.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Not complaining, though. Let the Sarkaz sort out their own biz! Maybe it's a good thing they muddled it up when it mattered.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: But if Babel wasn't there to rope you in, would you have any other reason?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: I used to be so sure, you know, I'd live my whole life in the mines.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Didn't need to mind what happens outside. Could say I knew nothing about it.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: That was your chance to take a gander out there, wasn't it? When you left Rim Billiton.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: I still remember, when you were just off, you were howling how you didn't wanna go. That's the thing, youngsters, y'know...
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Ha, haha...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Johnny, I... got to know a kid like me.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: You know how hard it is, with the Sarkaz life all around you, trying to grow up healthy.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But she chose to take it on. She learned to endure, to persevere, and kept hope in her heart all along.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: So much more she still needs to know and learn. She was always wrapped around me, asking me all sorts of questions.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: She likes the food I make, and she's especially interested in Rim Billiton's fables.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: A little rabbit. Where'd she come from?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Rim Billiton. But... she isn't gonna come back. So...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Honestly, I don't know either, why it is I'm worrying so much.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hmph, now isn't that easy—
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: You want to protect her.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I do. I do wanna protect her.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But now's not the time. I've got no reason to stay there, and none of the skill to guide her forward.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I knew. I should come back to Rim Billiton, is what I should do.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Seems like you've already found your calling, then, haven'tcha?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: It's not all that big a thing. After all, if I insisted on staying at Babel, other people wouldn't wanna hire me, and then I'd be out of a job, poor me! Haha...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: You utter case, you...
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Forget it, just do what you've gotta do now!
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Keeping us safe in the mines is all up to you Security lot.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Especially you. Seeing you'll give your mates plenty peace of mind.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: At least for now, we need you.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Right. I understand.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Odd of you, Johnny. Got a lot to say today, ain'tcha?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hmph, you're a special case. You've seen the world out there, now. Can't go around putting on airs anymore.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Haha, don't joke like that—
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: So?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Can't have forgotten our traditional Cautus virtues, coming all the way back from out yonder?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Huh? What virtues?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: You little girlie... prezzies, of course it's prezzies, to mark the occasion!
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: I've got no basis to leave Rim Billiton, no way to go out and see the sights. You youngsters, forgetting all about me the moment the chance for it lands in your lap...
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Haha, I'm having you on. How could I forget?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I didn't know if I'd have another chance to leave after I came back, so I made sure to buy whole trunks of stuff, and brought it back myself.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Here. A top-of-the-line hearing aid I picked up in Victoria, just for you.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Now that's more like it. All those shifts I had with you paid off.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: I'll be able to pick out what the kids are saying so much easier with this. Urgh, ruddy condition. Ruddy job.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Alright, alright. I'll head down to inspect, then.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hah, there's a familiar feeling.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Protective clothing so stuffy you choke, stiff and heavy worker's cap, can't wipe off your sweat even if you wanted to.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Mining away in tough conditions like these, risking your life with Originium for company.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: My people's lives, all spent upon these mines going dirtier and deeper.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: —This used to be my whole life, my everything. Just like the rest of us.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Is this how I'm gonna spend my future, same as the past?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Stoppit, stoppit, there's no point thinking so hard. I have to work properly, at the least... The safety, the lives of workers like Johnny are on my back, now.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But... I just can't help wondering...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.text: Will you get used to life without one of your kind by your side?
Can you grow big without someone making you good food from home?
I... have responsibilities, right now, that still need me.
If we really do face the same way in our steps, we

attributes.content: Two years later
1:34 P.M. \ Blistering heat
Iron Carrot City Exterior Mining Site, Mineshafts #27, #28, #29
Out—Get out!
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Worker

attributes.content: The dust's about to explode—
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Worker

attributes.content: Ugh—gaah—!
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Worker

attributes.content: Save m—*cough*, *cough*—
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Worker

attributes.content: Calm down! All of you, oxygen tanks on!
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Help—save me, for—
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Worker

attributes.content: What's the alarm sounding for?
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Security Chief

attributes.content: It's a serious danger alert... something's happened in the mines!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Report!
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Security Chief

attributes.content: I-It's gone to hell, Mineshafts #27, #28, #29 have all had active Originium dust explosions!
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Worker

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Tch...! I SAID we couldn't start work in this bloody weather!
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Security Chief

attributes.content: Bloody anything for that bit of output—
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Security Chief

attributes.content: Shaft #29... that's...!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Any casualties among personnel? What's the state of the site?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: There—There are workers buried in the collapse! Confirmed, there are wounded!
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Security Chief

attributes.content: Strewth! Savage!
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Security Chief

attributes.content: Understood!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Security Chief

attributes.content: Get rescuing. I'll lock down the accident site.
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Security Chief

attributes.content: —Get your protective gear on, and follow me!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Haah, haah...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Dig, dig... gotcha!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Are you still alive, oldie, are you still there?!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: —Johnny!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hold on! Grab my hand!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: *cough*...!
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Hurts... like hell...
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Hang in there, Johnny, we can get you!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Pull him out, quick!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Stay with me, Johnny! No sleeping now!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Savage, we're 300m from the medic tent!
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Worker

attributes.content: Rush him!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Got it!
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Worker

attributes.content: Hello, we're the joint emergency medical group assigned to this mining incident.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Rim Billiton PLC Security Group, haah, haah... wounded...!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Understood. We'll find a bed for them immediately.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Could you register some information with us for now? We need to contact next of kin immediately...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: The company will sort that out straight away! Just start treating him first!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Thomas, you stay behind to register and get set up with the branch.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Got it!
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Worker

attributes.content: Everyone else, with me! There's still wounded we haven't rescued.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Got it!
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Worker

attributes.content: Right, you're...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: My coworkers and I form a volunteer emergency aid group for this incident. We're from Rhodes Island Pharmaceuticals Inc.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: (Rhodes Island? I haven't heard of that company...)
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Alright, Rhodes Island. I'll... leave the oldie to you, then.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Please, you have to save him.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: We'll do what we can.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Ngh... quick, let's get the next one out!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Good work, Savage.
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Security Chief

attributes.content: All accounted for?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hardly believe it. We even found all the bodies. Twelve wounded, three critically, and the dead...
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Security Chief

attributes.content: That's enough.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Even if I didn't tell, nobody'd know it better than you.
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Security Chief

attributes.content: Judging by the concentration of Originium dust at the scene, the injured are all in big trouble...
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Security Chief

attributes.content: Where are you going?
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Security Chief

attributes.content: Aid post. I'm going to see the old man.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Right. There were a few medics out of the aid volunteers who came from 'Rhodes Island.' You heard of that organization before, chief?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Rhodes Island...? Doesn't ring a bell. Bet it's a fresh new company.
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Security Chief

attributes.content: Get going. Good chance to inspect while you're there. See what this Rhodes Island is here for.
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Security Chief

attributes.content: Hello, can I ask who you...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Ah, you're the one from the Security team! You carried the first of the wounded over, too.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Just call me Savage. I'm here to see how they're doing.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: One of the casualties just now... should be registered as 'John.'
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Mister John, is it? Please be assured, our Medic Operators have already administered emergency treatment to him.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Is... How are his injuries?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Right. Originium crystals penetrated to his arm and the flank of his abdomen. This ruptured his protective gear, and the amount of Originium particulate he inhaled afterwards also...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: So, he's already been infected for sure, hasn't he?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Y... Yes.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Damn it. Too slow.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: However, we've made use of Rhodes Island injective medication in the treatment already given to Mister John, and that's prevented any further progression of infection.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: What...? But, with injuries that bad, and wounds directly from active Originium crystals...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I do understand your concern, Miss.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Just... call me Savage. You said your drug injection stopped the spread? Is that true?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Yes, Miss Savage. All the personnel carried in so far have been administered emergency medication in accordance with their level of injury and severity of infection.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Some patients are not out of danger yet due to their overly severe blood loss, but their Originium infection symptoms have been fundamentally suppressed.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: All suppressed?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Yes, every one... Do you have any issues?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: No. Thing is, even if the drug works some wonders, it's not something you can give to workers straight away.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Rim Billiton's extant medical orgs all use cheap Originium infection meds, and they only do so little for workers who're already infected.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But then Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: You're a volunteer aid group, aren'tcha? These emergency meds aren't cheap, and the doses are pretty staggering. You all...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Er, I—I'm not responsible for any of that at all...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: But, I can promise you, Mister John's already out of mortal danger. He'll be able to receive visitors before long.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: It's not the same... Once they're Infected, workers' fates are already sealed.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: They're forced into even cheaper labor, sent to the exhausted mineshafts for all the most brutal, dangerous work, collecting remainders.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I'm sorry. When they arrived, most of the patients had already...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: No, I should be the one apologizing here. I'm sorry, you've already done so much and then some... thank you, a million times.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Miss Savage, I... I understand your feelings.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Director Kal'tsit once instructed us that no matter how many wounds we heal, how much Oripathy we suppress...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Once you've become Infected, no matter how unreasonable it is, most of society has already turned against you.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: That's right. Kal'tsit told you some...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Who did you—just say your director was?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Kal'tsit. She's an example to all our Medic Operators at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Director... Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Don't tell me...!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Who—Who's your leader? At Rhodes Island—What's the name of your leader at this Rhodes Island place?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: She's, um...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Tell me. Please, I need to know.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: She's called...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Our leader's, Rhodes Island's current leader's name is—
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: 'Amiya.'
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Excuse me, is there a problem?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: How is it Amiya...? If it really is her, she shouldn't be much older right now than—
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Mm-hm, yes, our leader is considerably young.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: But... you'll know once you talk to her, even once. She has wisdom beyond her years and a strong will. She's a truly outstanding leader.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Miss Savage, might you know some... Are you an old acquaintance of Amiya's, possibly?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Ah... um, we... were good friends since long ago.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Can you... Can you get in contact with Amiya? Just say my name, and she'll know.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I see. Amiya did mention she had a very close friend who might be here in Rim Billiton now...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: It... It really is Amiya... Can I go see her? How?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I'll get in touch with Rhodes Island's Messengers now. Also, Miss Savage, if you have anything you'd like us to relay to her...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.text: In this two-year span of time, Savage has been completely on her own, not once departing her post at that Rim Billiton mine.
She once thought, maybe, she should spend the rest of her life sound in Rim Billiton.
It took just an instant—the one instant she heard, from someone else
Savage already understands just what sort of decision she

attributes.content: Fifteen days later
Iron Carrot City Outskirts, Aid Station, in the Infected Ward
The moment I realized I was Infected, I even thought, maybe my family would've been much better off if I'd just carked it and they got the compensation money.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Don't say that.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Just a thought I had... *sigh*.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: The very first thing that came to mind, d'ya know, was I asked myself, how the hell should I face my family now?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: My better half and the kids don't like it when I'm angry, and they hate it even more when they see me cry.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: But when it's time to meet them, am I really gonna be able to smile?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: This is nothing like you, you oldie.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Everyone knows you as the most hopeful guy for miles around.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: When even you're seeing family with your ears drooped down, how're the rest of your mates meant to meet anyone?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Yeah, you're right!
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Worker

attributes.content: You're gonna spoil all our moods like that acting miserable, Johnny!
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Worker

attributes.content: Hmph. You don't have a bunch of tykes to feed. You don't know the pain of it. Life's a bastard one.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: We're all gonna have some bloody awful days too—
attributes.name: Rim Billiton Worker

attributes.content: Hey, Savage. Don't listen to another word from them.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: I've already decided. Pay'll be nowhere near enough to feed my family if I keep working at Rim Billiton.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Once the sickness lifts a little, we'll be off to Columbia, simple as that. All of us are heading to be part of the 'Great Expansion.'
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: John... you're really about to leave?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: When I was a miner for Rim Billiton, I was the most diligent, hardworking worker, bar none.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Now, I'm an Infected, and no matter how long I've still got left, I have to keep everyone at home living safely. Living happily.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Has it ever come to mind, so long as Rim Billiton's not done digging by the end of the day, this back-and-forth life's just gonna...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Savage.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Every person, every age, has callings and responsibilities to answer.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: I've never once been ashamed of being a mineworker. Nobody in Rim Billiton'd ever think that.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: But, you see, Savage, you left Rim Billiton, been back two years, and your thinking changed.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I knew you'd be no ordinary rabbit, ever since you were a nipper. Every last person has their own calling, and their own responsibilities.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Your hammer's saved our lives. In the days to come, you'll be saving countless more.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: If there's someone you need to protect, then leave, eh. It's the same for me.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Heh, peek at the face you're making. Looks like you made your mind up long ago, didn'tcha?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Hey, I'm not some emotionless robot, you oldie.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: It's just, this is something I've gotta go do.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I have a friend I need to protect.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Finally... I've found her again. I can see her again.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Even if it's just the slightest thing, for her, I'll give every last bit of strength I have.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hmph. There's nothing out there worth giving 'every last bit.' That's just you youngsters being too naive.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Haha... I mean, going into the mines for your family, and coming back out now for them, you said that, didn'tcha? You're using all your strength, giving it all you have too, right?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Who says I'm like you? I'm trying to feed a family here!
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Alright, alright.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: When're you looking to head out?
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Today. Came to see you for the last time, and then I'll be setting off.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: It's been by your help we didn't have one accident these past two years.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: And this one, well, it was you again who pulled us out alive... can't thank you enough.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: Well, you've got me put on a pedestal.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: John, you need to cherish the life I saved, and make sure you live the coming days well, alright?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: You rotten little girl.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: See you.
attributes.name: Johnny

attributes.content: See you too. Johnny.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: (It'll be goodbye for now, Rim Billiton.)
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Sorry, I've been keeping you.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Miss Savage, are you already done with all your goodbyes?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Seriously, John... told me right at the end, I should head back home again and give them a proper farewell.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Yesterday when I said goodbye to my mum and dad, my mum was going on about 'next time you come back, you'll have a special someone.'
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: This is for my career here!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hah, haha.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: All of you are such a happy group.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: I've linked up with the landship, and the expedited onboard application's all gone through. These papers are a recruitment contract from HR.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Detailed work matters should be handed over once we reach the landship, Miss Savage. Rhodes Island very much welcomes your arrival.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Well then... Miss Savage, have a good journey.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Medic Operator

attributes.content: Finally, finally.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I've found it.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Amiya, what are you like now?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: You've already grown into a leader. That's incredible.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Wait for me, Amiya. No matter what happens, no matter what calling you're shouldering.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I've got a lot I want to tell you, a lot of stories I want to share. Will you want to hear them?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: All the good and the bad that you've been through, all the good and the bad I've been through, in all these two years—
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Once we meet, let's tell each other all we want.
attributes.name: Savage
